text: Nastasen was a king of Kush who ruled the Kingdom of Kush from 335 to 315/310 BCE. According to a stela from Dongola, his mother was named Queen Pelkha and his father may have been King Harsiotef. His successor was Aryamani. ==Sources== * *Török, László, in: Fontes Historiae Nubiorum, II, Bergen 1996, 467-501, ==References== Category:Kushite Monarchs Category:4th-century BC monarchs of Kush Caregory:African royalty
title: Nastasen
